title: Where Angels Cry 2: Tears of the Fallen CE (2015) PC [FINAL]
description:
============================================
Where Angels Cry 2: Tears of the Fallen CE (2015) PC [FINAL]
============================================

- ENG

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

Can you stop the obsessed inquisitor and his reign of terror?
You have a new assignment! Dive back to 13th century medieval Europe as Vatican's best secret agent! 
Rumors have it that inquisitor Augustine went out of his mind. He became obsessed by witch-hunting. People are in terror. 
Travel to Spain, to an isolated village of Portonero and bring an end to this witch-hunting madness! No one is safe; no one is spared from inquisitor's blood-stained hands. Can you be the one that will bring peace and justice back to Portonero and his people?
The thrill and mystery is back in Where Angels Cry: Tears of the Fallen Collector's Edition*, an engaging puzzle-adventure game!
From now on, you are on your own!


============================================

============================================

- Investigate the isolated Portonero village and its mysterious surroundings
- Stop inquisitorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s madness and bring peace and justice to the people
- Solve hundreds of quests and dozens of minigames
